messages.text: Thanks!
Should be working again.
no rush!
I’ll get it back up as soon as I can.
Awesome
yeah i love that thing haha

Interesting, I thought that would just be a Not Found.
I’m not sure where our web player is going to live now that we have a new <http://8i.com|8i.com>, but we are have conversations about that today.
Glad to know its still getting used though :slightly_smiling_face:
hey i get an internal server error when i try to play the scene
Awesome! Thanks!
Should be fixed now, let me know if you are still seeing issues though.
All good! Tomorrow is fine
Let me know if you have any time constraints on getting content in there though.
Hey, sorry about that. <http://8i.com|8i.com> went live and looks like it is probably causing that issue. I was away for a few days, but I’m back now and I’ll see what I can do.
yo looks like the holo import site is down. mind taking a look when you have a chance
thanks!
Awesome, much appreciated. I am always happy to be aware of the ideas/suggestions too.
Totally. People ask for stuff without knowing the amount of work involved. I think producers are aware of it now, so I do my best to make sure they're clear on how urgent something actually is
Someone has to convince Thomas :slightly_smiling_face:
Alright, I think that its probably one of those things which we don’t do without a pretty good reason to do it.
i just told them we don't have the functionality. no need to work on it unless it becomes more urgent i think
no idea. it was a random producer question. i don't think they really need it
what is the use case?
I’ll have to check with some people first, but I’ll see what is possible
awesome, thanks!
We no longer have a way to set that up unfortunately, but I believe it could be added back in.
Hi there, is it still possible to have a continuous looping track of audio for a pose in holo?
sounds good. just glad to know there was a quick workaround
Cool, yea. Should only be for the short term too.
super easy
thanks! i'll use this method from now on
confirmed on iphone
Can you confirm for me on the iOS phone?
Alright, hopefully they are all good now
I’m back at my computer now, so I can do it for the current ones.
I will fix this so it happens automatically in future, but for today you will need to do that manual edit/save thing.
If you click the edit pencil on those, and then click the Save button at the bottom of the edit page it will refetch all of the data from the experience including the image.
and you will notice some HCABARET ones do not have the Image set.
you can view all poses
So from this page <https://holo.8i.com/flask-admin/holo-poses/>
The poses are used by the client to check what has changed, and it doesn’t look like they are seeing a change when the thumbnail gets set.
We have a Pose wrapper which is used exclusively for holo content.
Oh, thats not quite what I meant.
Looks like it didn't work for me. What was your exact process for re-saving? I just re-clicked "Save Experience"
ok i'll give that a try
Seems to have fixed it for my Android at least.
I might be able to fix that later today. But in the mean time if you can just re save each pose which has the issue it might fix them.
Oh actually, it might just be that setting the thumbnail isn't updating the pose.
sounds good, thanks!
Any client fix will probably take a few days minimum due to their release schedule. So if you are looking for a quick solution I recommend just adding the sprites. :slightly_smiling_face:
thanks!
iOS
Ok I'll check with the app teams. Have you checked on Android or iOS?
right. I don't know if it's still happening
HCABARET for reference
They probably should use the image when a Sprite isn't available.
i've been setting the thumbnail images and checking in the holo app to see if they show up, but i believe only blank boxes appear
I'm not sure, they used to use the thumbnail image, but it has been a while since I have tested that.

hey Mudge, 
do shots not show up with an image on the app if a sprite isn't set?
Cool, Thanks.
glad to know the product's improving :slightly_smiling_face:
yeah i think the hashtag filters was always sort of a bandaid for them
Much easier to find thing when you can browse all the characters though
Haha, yea I’ve started using the app a bit more recently, its not bad.
Good to know. Sounds like it's about time for me to download then on my personal
and you can only get on that by getting your email added to a whitelist.
Not actually sure we are doing anything special in Beta anymore
sounds good
I’ll keep the filter in for a bit longer, but aim to remove it next week unless there is any problems
is there a link to holo beta for iOS?
I’m happy to help if they need me for anything
we can implement this immediately
definitely
If you wouldn’t mind, could you run it by a couple of the producers next time you let them know some content is ready
Oh right
producers then QC within the app
we do our QC in orthrus
Oh cool
If that's the case, then I'm all for removing the other filters
yeah, i actually haven't opened the app in ages. this is making more sense now
Yea
ah, in the actual app?
It was a feature request, if you are on the most recent version of holo you should see a filter called “Characters” which is the 3rd filter.
Oh yea, sorry, we have been calling it that over here. But I just realised that might not be an obvious thing to you.
Perhaps not. I've been referring to the Interface > Filters
Its a newish filter which lists all of the Characters
Actually, do you know what I mean by “Character filter”?

But yea, have a look at the Character filter option, and see if you think it might make things easier.
I feel like it will be easier to find what you are looking for than by using filters.
Because there is often more than one character being set to a shoot name, like with HCABARET
Yea, that is part of the current flow before we make anything live.
Is it easy to change the poses to a different character?
but because we tag and set character at the same time, it would be the same poses both ways
I don’t believe so, you would just view a Character page instead of a set of poses with the same tag
in regard to what appears in the app
would there be no difference?
Is that going to be a better way
sure, that should be easy
But what about getting producers to find their content through the character filter instead?
Ok
I don't know who started that naming convention, but it's what the producers expect.
It would be great if it included the hashtag moving forward
No it wouldn’t, but I believe the #HCABARET filter must have existed from before I added this.
ah, got it. So let's say it creates a filter -- does it include the hashtag before the name?
And if it finds a Filter which show the tag, it doesn’t create a new one.
Then it looks to see if there is a filter showing that tag, which in this case it would have found your manually created “#HCABARET” Filter
Firstly it will create a “HCABARET” tag if one doesn’t already exist
Yea, the tag vs filter thing is a little tricky. I am automatically creating both a Tag and a Filter currently.
I'm looking at the filter page to look for a HCABARET character, and i only see the #HCABARET filter I made manually
I see. To clarify, this is a filter and not a tag? We currently use filters to consolidate poses to view in the app
Probably easier to browse through those (in alphabetical order and vertical scrolling) than to continue making lots of new filters.
Because now we should always be able to browse the Character filter to find private characters
Yea it does check to see if a filter already exists with the name before it creates a new one. I was just thinking about turning off the automatic filter creation

Hey there, I've been using the function constantly, even when I've previously made the character. I thought these characters were being placed in the same filter regardless, even if the filter was already previously made. Is that not the case?

At the moment it auto creates a Character and then also a Filter (private for <http://8i.com|8i.com> users). I’m thinking now that the Character filter exists we can probably stop creating the filter every time, any problem with that?
Hey man, Just checking in regarding the “Create Holo Character” function from the Holo Admin. You got any suggestions/improvement requests?
awesome. works now. thanks!
Hey, sorry that took so long, but the new IP address should have access now.
Cool
no rush for now, thanks
Awesome, may take me a little while. Let me know if you are in any rush though
Oh yup, that would make sense. Can you get your IP address? I can add it to the whitelist
hey there, it looks like I can't access the CMS from the new stage. I don't think our IP address is whitelisted yet. Any idea who I should talk to to add it?
thanks!!
and updated the files for the original ones as well
Alright cool, I think I’ve cleaned those duplicates up
ah got it. all right, all good
I also need to make a change to stop them being recreated
I’m not actually sure if you have the permissions to delete or not
I’ll delete them
ah i see. thanks for catching that. so i just need to delete one, right?
The first one is missing a thumbnail, which I believe you always set after the first upload, so it must be the duplicate
On <https://holo.8i.com/admin/scene?tagName=HMAGICMIKE> you can see HMAGICMIKE_400 twice
So the audio files are only added to the new version, and the old one has remained untouched
Yea, I think what has happened is instead of updating the old experience, it has created a new one.
odd, it looks like there has been 2 scenes created
i believe this is what's showing up in the app
i'm accessing from the CMS: <https://holo.8i.com/admin/s/d2d16810-ba6f-4a92-a4aa-d461e140c0dc?tab=Experience>
I can see the 400_2.wav file here <https://holo.8i.com/admin/s/57aea8ba-8217-4f81-bb06-30ad289860a0?tab=Experience>
what page are you looking at?
all good
oh right, sorry I thought that the existing audio was the right one.
when looking at the import page, the shot has been updated with the 400_2 file
i'm looking at 400, and the 400_2 wav file won't turn up, even if i update from S3
260 looks alright though

You can update a Pose at any time, by editing it, and then just saving it. 
This will force the updated time to change and that lets the apps knowing to update the pose.
so if the sound was added in the last couple of hours, the update will not be noticed
It looks to me like the audio is there. But the Pose in the CMS was last updated about 2.5 hours ago
hey mudge, i've updated HMAGICMIKE_400 and 260's audio files in Import, but they don't update on the CMS. Any idea why that's the case?
awesome, thanks!
I’ve run my fix which should mean that all experiences now have their files from amazon available.
It could of just been some cached JS or something which wasn’t working
all good
thanks for the tip
i'll let you know if i run into it again
ah very strange. it works for me now too as well
HMAGICMIKE_160 has Existing files
It seemed to work for me just now, were you getting any kind of error?
oh really?
i believe "update files from amazon" currently doesn't work for these shots. that might also be worth looking into
I’ll have the fix run later today
but in the meantime you can fix individual experiences by clicking into them and then clicking the “Update files from amazon.” button
ah yea, I have a fix which I need to perform at some point today

hi there! I've been having issues updating shots on the import page. An easy example is HMAGICMIKE, where you'll see shots such as HMAGICMIKE_160 that display staging files without existing files. Those shots will hang when you try to update them.
it might be related to the chrome extensions i use
Weird, it should usually redirect automatically to that page when it needs to
thanks, that link allowed me to log back in
make sure its using your <mailto:andrew@8i.com|andrew@8i.com> email
Try <https://holo.8i.com/admin/eighti/login>
oh strange, let me check
when i open the page via separate browser/incognito, i can log in and access
as it stands, i can't search for shots on the import page due to: "Insufficient permissions to access content"
hi is there a way for me to sign in and out of the import site?
got it, thanks
but I’ll let you know once we have a solution
there is only one setting for global vs limited countries and it applies everywhere
I don’t know if its their policy, but just how things work
and this is just google's policy?
hmmm...that sounds tricky
apparently you can’t have a global beta when you have a limited country public release
its not just ben who is having the issue
I just chatted with Isaac and he says he is working on a solution
oh he is on the list
yup
just <mailto:ben@8i.com|ben@8i.com> right?
sweet
yea
and I can add other accounts if you would like them to be on the beta
can we just add him to the whitelist? it's his private device
got it
You will always be able to use <mailto:holotesting@8i.com|holotesting@8i.com> to install the app
ah, he is probably not whitelisted on google play
(ben)
an 8i account
hmm, what google account are you logged in as?
unfortunately, it still says that the app is not available in our country, even after being approved to be a tester
ok sweet
hopefully that link should be better, it should always require a user to log in.
yea I probably gave you the public link, which would of worked when we didn’t have a public version yet, as it would of fallen back on the beta version
i'll see if this works
ah no this is a different link from what i've shared
All good
i'll get back to you on this

Can you confirm the link for me, I may have given you a different one at the time. 
To get the beta version it should be <https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.eighti.holo.android>
we have a whitelist on google play about who can access the beta version of our app
Google and 8i have separate concepts of users
sorry beta user is one of those overloaded terms, I keep saying it, but it can mean more than one thing
Not for google play, we have a whitelist of emails allowed to access the app there
ah, are all 8i accounts considered betas?
Let me check on that. I think that link should still work, provided you are logged in as a beta user
oh
oh also, i think the link you sent me to download holo is no longer active (region-blocked for the US). any chance i could get a new link?
awesome
We are fully over onto the new amazon backend now, so hopefully that will stay working pretty good for a while
i surprise even myself
me too
glad your so excited about it
anyways, yeah. it works :slightly_smiling_face:
haha :slightly_smiling_face:
whoops
SITE WORKS. THANKS!
Should be back up and running now
thanks!
Looking at it now
hey there, i think the import site's down again
all good. thanks!
It is fixed now, sorry about the delay
thanks!
Ah right. I'll take a look
hey mudge, i'm getting the following notification when i try to set a screenshot for SPIDERMANTEST shots: "there was an error from amazon. See console for more."
awesome thanks!
Hey, the import page should be back up and working now
yea
exciting :slightly_smiling_face:
ok sweet
Holo is going live today, so we needed an amazon backend which could scale up easily as needed.
Alright, thats good to know, I’ll make sure its up before then.
hmm not urgent today but will be by end of week
is there any important content you have which needs to go out?
I’ll look into it but its probably something I’ll need to get other people to help with
Hey, the amazon backend we use is being switched, so I’m guessing that is probably the issue
hi there, it appears the import page might be down: <https://holo.8i.com/admin/eighti/import>
awesome, thanks
Oh cool, yea sorry about that. It should all be a lot easier to deal with now without the automatic migration.
thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
i think the audio files are sticking now. you were probably right about disabling migration
fingers crossed
ok got it
I think what happened is that I didn’t actually push my last change (disabling migration) into prod until sometime yesterday
but yea, I imagine if its happening each 30 minutes it would probably happen a little later, after you had finished.
Cool, let me know if you do see it.
i'll check again right now
I thought I had disabled it though so I’ll need to double check that
it sounds like the migration script is still running, each 30 minutes sounds about right, and its possible that could cause it to reselect the first audio file.
has that happened this morning?
i'll give you an exact example as soon as i replicate
oh right
i'll double-check and see if it happens within this hour
so i believe what's happened before is that it'll initially use the audio you select from the dropdown, but will revert back to the first audio file
and the multiple thing shouldn’t be an issue, selecting any of them should do the same thing
I’ll add a fix, but you might just need to change it via that edit page if it doesn’t work for now.
sounds to me like upload is working but its not selecting the new audio file properly
ah yea, it might not be checking for duplicates
it could just be that it is not selecting it after the upload
this is probably because i clicked on the "upload" button 3 times
once i go there, i see the file i'd like to change it to 3 times
Is the audio file available in the drop down?
yes
on one of the items which didn’t work can you click on the name and go to the edit page?
looks like the upload feature isn't working either for a couple shots
I think the import page can be unsure about which audio to use if there are multiple files, but it should always copy them
but for audio updates etc the upload is probably nicer
Yea, I thought import would be easier for bulk experiences
for*
i can stick to upload. in many ways, that's even easier fo rme
right, the import page is the one that doesn't work
and if you want to copy from <http://clouds.8i.com|clouds.8i.com> you will need to use the import page
but “Upload” should mean from your local computer
ok, so i'll stick to this method for now
so both should be possible
which is fine, i suppose. is that how it should be done from now on?
but i had to upload from our local server, not from the cloud
i used it once, and that worked
Are you using the “Upload new audio” button on the <https://holo.8i.com/admin/eighti/?tagName=HSPACE> page?
Hey, sorry saw your message earlier, but then got sidetracked.
you can use HSPACE or HNAUTICAL as examples
hey mudge, it looks like updating sound files don't save. they'll work initially and revert back to the original sound file
fix worked! thanks for your help
looking into how to prevent that happening again.
There was something wrong with the async email sending. I restarted it, and it should of sent everything from the backlog.
odd, let me try it and see if something is up
i do reach the notification that a confirmation email's been sent, but i've yet to see one in the <mailto:holotesting@8i.com|holotesting@8i.com> inbox
username: <mailto:holotesting+test17@8i.com|holotesting+test17@8i.com> pw: h0l0betatesting!
hmm...so i tried to create accounts via the app, but i've yet to receive a confirmation email
makes sense
hence the suggestion to use different accounts for now :slightly_smiling_face:
yea, it wasn’t even something we thought about until quite recently
i see...probably not the most urgent issue either, given it's just for initial installation
its just our server which doesn’t support it properly yet
and for installing the app its logging into google which allows for multiple logins
got it, thanks for clarifying
yea, hopefully not for app login, just for installing the app
i see...that's a potential issue then, since it's highly likely multiple people will be using holotesting at once
but for <mailto:andrew@8i.com|andrew@8i.com> it should not log you out often
if you were using a generic user account, like <mailto:holotesting@8i.com|holotesting@8i.com> it could happen due to multiple people using it
yea it would be annoying
oh thats good

will be pretty confusing for others if they have to log in every time...will flag to isaac if it's a repeating issue. my phone actually isn't logging me out anymore so it seems to have resolved itself overnight
haha definitely
probably be good testing for the sign up flow as well :slightly_smiling_face:
Cool
makes sense
and <mailto:holotesting@8i.com|holotesting@8i.com> will get all the activation emails, but you should already have access to that account email because you need it to download the app
you should be able to sign up users with in the app
maybe use <mailto:holotesting+test1@8i.com|holotesting+test1@8i.com>, <mailto:holotesting+test2@8i.com|holotesting+test2@8i.com> etc
otherwise you will most likely get conflicts as the backend only keeps one active login per account
Its probably a good idea to use a different account on each device too
yea you should be able to make as many accounts as you like
if i were to do that, it would just be <mailto:newemail+holo@8i.com|newemail+holo@8i.com>, right?
now that i'm updating all of our phab devices, i'm wondering if i could get a login that wasn't my username :smile:
Cool
i think the main thing was for me to just re-update all of them on /import -- i just selected all and updated
thanks!
makes sense
oh and changing that file doesn’t affect the loaded scene until you refresh the page.
If the audio file doesn’t show up there, you can try refreshing the files via “Update files from amazon”
but you can choose it explicitly on <https://holo.8i.com/admin/eighti/s/bae9200a-2f35-4d65-b4e8-5885ad0319ea?tab=Experience>
i'll keep that in mind
or something like that
Yea, when there is multiple audio files I think it just defaults the first one alphabetically
thanks!
just replicated
got it
but you can change that in the experience edit page
ah i see
It might not automatically select the new audio file as default
for context, _fix has a couple clicks at the start of its audio
select the Update checkbox and “Create/Update selected” should copy all the files across
it plays the older one
it doesn't play the updated sound file
so when I click on Play Scene after hitting update and clicking on the shot
right
<https://holo.8i.com/admin/eighti/import?s3_prefix=HSPACE>
Yes
by re-import, do you mean clicking on Update in on /import
but yea, using the same file name doesn’t work and is a known issue, but I just don’t have a good fix for it right now
Thanks
all righty i'll try to replicate
to test
I re imported it and that file can be selected now
yes i just added that
I see a file called HSPACE_350_fix.wav
how did you update the audio file?
right, so first i used HSPACE_350_2, but it didn't find that filename in the dropdown
amazon has a caching policy of about a week I believe so to combat that we do need to change use new file names each time you update a file
did you use the same file name?

Hi there, I'm trying to update an audio file for HSPACE_350. I've went ahead and replaced the HSPACE_350 audio with the updated version, but it won't pick that file up. It still uses the older audio file, even though it no longer lives on the cloud
all good, I like to see this progressing
thanks again for all your help
and i'll try to look more into the login issue before i make a jira issue or talk to isaac
thanks. i'll make sure we're sticking to this from now on
it works :slightly_smiling_face:
and give it a second to reload the values
just kill the app and restart it
alright, its in now, and seems to be working
got it
and that should work with the current app
its just a null instead of a empty object
awesome, thanks!
make sure it works and let you know
I’ll get it in soon
trying to decide whether to continue using old model or just waiting
so what would the ETA be on defaulting static images in the absence of sprites?
np
thanks for the link
good point
just good to get all the details down in one place first
but yea if you think its important its worth slacking someone as well
API/CMS or Android or iOS
Yea, you can use a component to specify who should get it
It should auto update, but that can take 24 hours to happen
ah i see there's quite a backlog
Just make sure you update the app to the latest version and check that you still get the bug
you can always chase up isaac as well though
for things like the login issue it might be good
and the project is HOLOALL
<https://eighteye.atlassian.net/secure/Dashboard.jspa>
makes sense
Its getting used pretty heavily for Holo
would be good to re-send me a link, and i'll bookmark it
LA doesn't use JIRA, but we had a phase lol
i believe i did at one point
Do you have access to Jira, our bug tracking tool?
hmm, I hadn’t noticed that
not sure if this was done on purpose or not, so just wanted to make sure
one other thing to note...this might just be an issue with my account, but i keep having to log back in whenever i exit the app
yup, i think this is it. as soon as we can use static thumbnails, we'll be good
but yea let me know whatever we need to get done to move towards that :slightly_smiling_face:
yea, thats what I’m hoping for
if we just work on this, we can just stop supporting the older scene model
ok thanks. i appreciate it!
and I will fix it so that it falls back to static thumbnail when the sprite is missing.
so the quick fix is to set a sprite image for each of the scenes
it always trys to use the sprite image, even when it is a empty value
looks like there is an issue with deciding between sprite images and thumbnail images
might have to follow up (thumbnails still not showing up on the app :/)
thanks so much
I’ve got stand up now, but let me know if you have any other questions.
cool all good
thanks for that
yup that works
probably make it a bit more efficient
you could batch set character though
yea, which is probably not what you’d want :slightly_smiling_face:
right, or else they'd all just be made blank i presume
because it only runs code on the fields which have a new value to set
that would be a nice feature though hehe
yup unfortunately not
I think it might not do anything
but give it a try and see
I’m not sure how the blank batch edit works, think it does things a bit differently
e.g the scene thumbnail
just clicking a blank batch edit update will suffice?
its just when you edit something further away
Yea, anything which needs a save auto updates
since all i need to do is just re-save, right?
got it, and any updates (such as a caption) will force an update i assume
<https://holo.8i.com/flask-admin/holo-poses/>
I believe the main pose page also shows them in order of last updated, so anything which you just changed should be at the top of that
but I guess this was a bit of a strange case
You shouldn’t need to do it usually
ah, yes that helps
Good for you to know how that last updated time works though, and knowing that re-saving the pose will force it to update.
It probably should have auto updated that when the thumbnail got set, but it doesn’t seem to have done
so the phones won’t know to update
and the others are still saying they are last updated 2 hours before then
and the last updated is now “2017-05-10 22:15”
I just did an “Edit” > “Save” on HCABARET_160
its in UTC which might make the timezone funny
which the phones use to decide if they need to fetch new versions
you can also see the last updated column
so those are good to go, right? we just need to wait?
yup
i see thumbnails in the Image column
so here's context from what i'm seeing
<https://holo.8i.com/flask-admin/holo-poses/?search=hcabaret>
have you set thumbnails for all the scenes?
Alright, looks like its just needs to be updated in order to refetch the latest scene thumbnail
yup, looking at that now, I’m not sure I was right about the migrate script
right now, the thumbnails still aren't visible
right. the one thing left is fixing the thumbnail issue on the android page
Should mean we don’t need to add content for the old app much any more.
no prob
Thanks for getting on that
Oh thats awesome news
so we'll start switching apps on all review devices this week :slightly_smiling_face:
we did some testing with the android beta on the tango device, and it actually tracks well enough for producers to review with it
oh, which reminds me
I want to disconnect the old content for tango app as much as possible
I think turning of the migrate script is still a good step forward though
Yea, I think that is fine, considering the options available for now
but if the opposite is true, i'll just stick to the 171 method
i started not doing that bc i thought this could potentially cause issues on your end
all righty, i actually prefer versioning up (eg. 171 instead of re-submitting 170) so i dont think you have to turn off the migrate script
Yea, I don’t think I had considered the case where you needed to be able to view multiple version of the same shot
anyways, i found a bug a week ago or so that i've pretty much been using to make multiple scenes from one shot
thanks for the quick fix btw
i've done this a few times
ok so let's say i uploaded a scene with the same name twice
I’ll see about getting that turned off now though, if you are happy to upload the content separately
but yea its probably good for you to know that if you create a new and old scene with the same name, the migrate script will try and keep them in sync
was just a simple one
Oh cool, found the problem. Fix is out now
thanks
All good, will let you know once I’ve got a fix
all good! thanks for looking into it
